data.message: I don't want messenger, so the only way I can get my messages is by going to the table computer which I hardly use?  Sure wish you did not change the messages.

replies.message: We’re sorry to hear that, Cindy. We’re working hard to ensure that our updates improve everyone’s Facebook experience. Please let us know how we can make your experience more enjoyable here: http://bit.ly/2lhybU7. -Rhea
Hey how do I get rid of some profiles that I made in forgot the password is there anyway you can help me get rid of them

Hi Angel. You can learn more about how to remove an old account you can’t log into here: http://bit.ly/2mdFa3u. Please keep in mind that it's against our Community Standards to maintain more than one personal account. -Neha
You need to stop forcing this app on your users.
